short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A game made for the hardest of workers. Thread into the cafe and make some coffee. Then sit back and do some actual important work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cola's cafe is a vertical slice of a idle game that runs while you work. Made to be played while you are working. Just fire it up, choose how long you want to open the cafe, and then serve your customers. Don't be afraid to close the popup, you will get a notifications as soon as a new customer arrives.
